pkgmetadata.longdescription: Conduct Direction-Projection-Permutation Tests and Display Plots // Conducts a direction-projection-permutation test and displays several key plots to facilitate the visual assessment of the test. See Wei et. al (2016) doi:10.1080/10618600.2015.1027773 and Lam et. al (2018) doi:10.1080/10618600.2017.1366915 for more details.
